Package com.baharmand.marketplaceapi.service

Interface AdService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdServiceImpl
public interface AdService
Service interface for advertisement-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • createAd

      AdDTOView createAd(AdDTOForm adDTOForm)
      Creates a new advertisement based on the provided form.
      Parameters:
      adDTOForm - Form containing information for creating the advertisement.
      Returns:
      View representation of the created advertisement.

    • updateAd

      AdDTOView updateAd(AdUpdateDTOForm adDTOForm)
      Updates an existing advertisement based on the provided form.
      Parameters:
      adDTOForm - Form containing information for updating the advertisement.
      Returns:
      View representation of the updated advertisement.

    • getActiveAdvertisements

      List<AdDTOView> getActiveAdvertisements()
      Retrieves a list of active advertisements.
      Returns:
      List of active advertisements.

    • getAdsForDaysAgo

      List<AdDTOView> getAdsForDaysAgo(Integer daysAgo)
      Retrieves advertisements between today and specified number of days.
      Parameters:
      daysAgo - Number of days ago to consider for filtering advertisements.
      Returns:
      List of advertisements within the specified time frame.

    • isAdvertisementBelongsToUser

      boolean isAdvertisementBelongsToUser(String adId, String userEmail)
      Checks if the advertisement belongs to user or not.
      Parameters:
      adId - The id associated with the advertisement
      userEmail - User's email
      Returns:
      A boolean showing if the email matches the email associated withe advertisement or not
